name: Exclicinor
description:
An infinite runner game but you are the blade.

Controls:

Z: Jump

X: Attack

C: Skill

V: Upgrade


A normal attack (X button) will only hit the blue enemy and not the magenta enemy.

In order to hit the magenta creature, use a skill attack (C button and required mana), the strong attack will not hit a blue enemy.

Upgrade skill (V button and required gem). Upgrade cost is display under the collected gem.

Credits:

Programming, Graphics, Sound by Mystialic
